Home » 15A4 Catukkanipātapāḷi » 5 Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka » 5.7 Kammapathavagga
5.7.2 Adinnādāyīsutta
Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka
Kammapathavagga
Adinnādāyīsutta
265.
1571“Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. Katamehi catūhi? Attanā ca adinnādāyī hoti, parañca adinnādāne samādapeti, adinnādāne ca samanuñño hoti, adinnādānassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—  imehi kho…pe… .
1572Attanā ca adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, parañca adinnādānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti, adinnādānā veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti, adinnādānā veramaṇiyā ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—  imehi kho, bhikkhave…pe… .
1573Dutiyaṃ.
